scripts.install-devDeps: npm i -D @html-eslint/eslint-plugin @html-eslint/parser @microsoft/eslint-plugin-sdl @next/eslint-plugin-next @release-it/conventional-changelog @tanstack/eslint-plugin-query @types/aria-query @types/better-sqlite3 @types/d3 @types/d3-flextree @types/node @types/request-ip @typescript-eslint/parser animated-tailwindcss-ct autoprefixer daisyui eslint eslint-config-problems eslint-formatter-summary eslint-plugin-anti-trojan-source eslint-plugin-barrel-files eslint-plugin-compat eslint-plugin-depend eslint-plugin-eslint-comments eslint-plugin-file-progress eslint-plugin-fsecond-ct eslint-plugin-github eslint-plugin-import-access eslint-plugin-jsdoc eslint-plugin-json eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-lodash-f eslint-plugin-morect eslint-plugin-no-secrets eslint-plugin-no-unsanitized eslint-plugin-observers eslint-plugin-perfectionist eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-promise eslint-plugin-react-compiler eslint-plugin-react-dom eslint-plugin-react-hook-form eslint-plugin-react-hooks eslint-plugin-react-hooks-extra eslint-plugin-react-naming-convention eslint-plugin-react-perf eslint-plugin-react-refresh eslint-plugin-react-web-api eslint-plugin-react-x eslint-plugin-redos eslint-plugin-regexp eslint-plugin-risxss eslint-plugin-simple-import-sort eslint-plugin-sonarjs eslint-plugin-ssr-friendly eslint-plugin-tsdoc eslint-plugin-typescript-enum eslint-plugin-unicorn eslint-plugin-write-good-comments eslint-plugin-xss prisma release-it tailwindcss-animated terser ts-key-enum tsup typedoc typedoc-material-theme typedoc-plugin-coverage typedoc-plugin-include-example typedoc-plugin-inline-sources typedoc-plugin-mdn-links typedoc-plugin-missing-exports typedoc-plugin-rename-defaults typescript typescript-eslint
scripts.publish-patch: rm -rf *.tgz && npm version patch && auto-changelog --hide-credit --hide-empty-releases -p --output README.md && git add README.md && git commit && git push && rm -rf dist && set NODE_ENV=production && npx tsup && npm pack && node publish.js
scripts.publish-minor: rm -rf *.tgz && npm version minor && auto-changelog --hide-credit --hide-empty-releases -p --output README.md && git add README.md && git commit && git push && rm -rf dist && set NODE_ENV=production && npx tsup && npm pack && node publish.js
scripts.publish-major: rm -rf *.tgz && npm version major && auto-changelog --hide-credit --hide-empty-releases -p --output README.md && git add README.md && git commit && git push && rm -rf dist && set NODE_ENV=production && npx tsup && npm pack && node publish.js
scripts.release-minor: export NODE_ENV=production; npx dotenv -- release-it minor --ci
scripts.release-patch: export NODE_ENV=production; npx dotenv -- release-it patch --ci
scripts.release-major: export NODE_ENV=production; npx dotenv -- release-it major --ci
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/index.ts && zip -FSqr docs.zip docs && rm -rf docs
